Subbed Projects.Show Name: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Stardust Crusaders

Good Comments: Good attempt to localize the language, in the spirit of the original JoJo manga.
Bad Comments: Uses Commie's typesetting, and has a script with gg's style from Jojo 2012 (meaning very over-the-top dialogues, and character-nationality words inserted.)
ok, if you're fine with british talk
